https://tmrev.io/movie/597397-BOSS: The Black Experience in Business 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xQLQxdvZgWXZvOO7DIjyzKbvADf.jpg The history of business and entrepreneurship lies at the heart of the American story, but often absent are the names and experiences of African Americans who, from the country’s earliest days, have embodied the qualities of innovation, risk-taking and determination to forge a path toward a better life – which is at the heart of the American entrepreneurial spirit. BOSS: The Black Experience in Business
